divs: Sighting Detailsmy dad was a long haul truck driver i used to ride along sometimes in the summer. I was about 7 years old and we were going across the desert. I was stairring at the brightest star in the sky.my dad was driving and my mom was asleep in the sleeper.i was starring at it for quite a while and all of a sudden it took off streight up in the sky and was gone with in a second or two. i knew it wasnt a metor because they fall down not up into space and it was way to fast.its stuck out in my mind as my "ufo"sighting for the past 30 years.
Summary: saw brightest star in sky take off instantly into outerspace.
